member.name: T:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame
member.summary: Abstract class to aid in Gamemaking. Implements an instance of the ConsoleEngine and has Looping methods.

member.name: P:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.Engine
member.summary: Instance of a ConsoleEngine.

member.name: P:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.FrameCounter
member.summary: A counter representing the current unique frame we're at.

member.name: P:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.FrameTotal
member.summary: A counter representing the total frames since launch

member.name: P:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.DeltaTime
member.summary: Factor for generating framerate-independent physics. time between last frame and current.

member.name: P:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.StartTime
member.summary: The time the program started in DateTime, set after Create()

member.name: P:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.TargetFramerate
member.summary: The framerate the engine is trying to run at.

member.name: M:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.Construct(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,ConsoleGameEngine.FramerateMode)
member.summary: Initializes the ConsoleGame. Creates the instance of a ConsoleEngine and starts the game loop.

member.name: M:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.GetFramerate
member.summary: Gets the current framerate the application is running at.

member.name: M:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.Create
member.summary: Run once on Creating, import Resources here.

member.name: M:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.Update
member.summary: Run every frame before rendering. Do math here.

member.name: M:ConsoleGameEngine.ConsoleGame.Render
member.summary: Run every frame after updating. Do drawing here.
